name: Marie Curie: The Courage of Knowledge

name: The Woman Who Left

name: The Red Siren
summary_text: A 12 y.o. girl reports her powerful mom to the police for having killed the nanny. She runs away and is helped by an ex-soldier/assassin to find her dad in Portugal while the mom has her people try prevent this. Shooting follows.

name: Maden
summary_text: Mine workers in Turkey struggling for better working conditions.

name: O Bandido da Luz Vermelha
summary_text: The story of a famous Brazilian criminal, called The Red Light Bandit because he always used a red flashlight to break in the houses during the night. Working alone, he also used to rape his female victims.

name: Akai tenshi
summary_text: During the Sino-Japanese War, a young army nurse gives sympathy to her patients and falls in love with an impotent doctor who's addicted to morphine.

name: Mili
summary_text: A reclusive, depressed man and a bubbly young woman fall in love but then find out that she has cancer.

name: Blind Woman's Curse
summary_text: The head of a yakuza gang is being trailed by a mysterious, vengeful blind woman.

name: Winter Love Story
summary_text: Cassie has just published her first book, a romcom on her divorce experience. To help a new writer along, the publisher pairs her with the established "dragon writer" Elliot on a week long book tour. Will they remain singles?

name: Homestay
summary_text: When "Temporary Body" is a wonderful award from heaven. Min has 100 days to change his life.

name: The Christmas Cure
summary_text: A doctor returns home for Christmas to find that her father has decided to retire from his own practice. After reuniting with her high school sweetheart, she wonders if she should stay and take over her father's practice.

name: Débarquement immédiat!
summary_text: This is the story of a border police cop who brings a guy back to his country, except that he's not the right guy and it's not the right country.

name: Love Finds You in Valentine
summary_text: Kennedy Blaine, a Californian girl, inherits a ranch in the small town of Valentine in Nebraska. Before she sells the property, she decides to spend the summer in her house and learn more about her family.

name: Anthony Jeselnik: Caligula
summary_text: Anthony Jeselnik brings his signature dark and twisted point of view to this extended and uncensored special. He holds nothing back, routinely saying things most wouldn't ever dare. Anthony is not for the easily offended or humorless.

name: Undocumented
summary_text: A documentary crew accompany a group of illegal immigrants crossing the Border, but their plans run afoul when they are captured by a gang of sadistic radicals in New Mexico.

name: Phoonk
summary_text: An atheist is forced to consult an exorcist after his daughter shows signs of being possessed.

name: Alien Abduction
summary_text: After being abducted by extra terrestrials, Jean and her friends are committed to a top secret government run mental institution to undergo tests and be brainwashed.

name: Sucker Free City
summary_text: Sucker-Free City, or S.F.C., revolves around the conflicts among white, black, Latino and Asian street gangs in San Francisco.

name: Santa and the Ice Cream Bunny
summary_text: When Santa's sleigh gets stuck in Florida, he tells a group of kids the story of Thumbelina.

name: Beaumarchais the Scoundrel
summary_text: The life story of the titular Beaumarchais, playwright and adventurer, who gets himself into numerous different scrapes and romantic encounters in 18th Century France.

name: Engaging Father Christmas
summary_text: This Christmas promises to be the best of Miranda Chester's life. She has returned to the beautiful New England town of Carlton Heath, where last year she found love with Ian McAndrick and she is among the family she never knew she had.

name: Albüm
summary_text: A middle-class Turkish couple is far from willing to admit they used adoption as a last resort to build a family, and will do anything to keep it a secret.

name: Belle et Sébastien, l'aventure continue
summary_text: September, 1945. Sebastian impatiently waits for the return of his friend Angelina, whom he has not seen for two years. When the plane carrying the young woman to her small village in the ...                See full summary »

name: The Convent
summary_text: During the 17th Century a young woman is saved from execution and led to a priory to repent her sins but discovers a greater evil lies within.

name: Operation Shmenti Capelli
summary_text: Operation Shmenti Capelli is one of the most unique filmmaking stories in Bulgaria during the last twenty years. The long awaited eccentric comedy is a personal dream of popular Bulgarian ...                See full summary »

name: Shukra
summary_text: A couple enters a city ruled by cruel thugs but an unsettling affair reopens unexpected twists and creates new tensions for them. Will they stick together through it all?

name: Midnight Bayou
summary_text: Silver spoon Boston lawyer Declan Fitzpatrick fell in instant love with a Louisiana bayou 'haunted' estate when he drove by with college friends. Now he learns it's on sale and rushes to ...                See full summary »

name: The American Mall
summary_text: A musical romantic comedy set at a mall and focused on the relationship between two young musicians and their respective personal and professional struggles.

name: The Three Investigators and the Secret of Skeleton Island
summary_text: Three kid detectives go on an epic journey to eerie Skeleton Island. Once home to pirates, it's now plagued by a mysterious beast.

name: Ten 'til Noon
summary_text: In ten minutes, everything can change - for these ten people, it will. An innovative real-time crime thriller in which the murderous events of one fateful day, committed between 11:50am and noon, are replayed from different points of view.

name: Diamante Lobo
summary_text: A priest and his twin brother take turns defending a small town from the vicious Clayton gang.

name: The Trial of Billy Jack
summary_text: After Billy Jack in sentenced to four years in prison for the "involuntary manslaughter" of the first film, the Freedom School expands and flourishes under the guidance of Jean Roberts. The...                See full summary »

name: King Dinosaur
summary_text: A new planet moves into the Solar system and four scientists (two couples) are sent to explore planet Nova. In between romantic interludes, the cast faces an iguana masquerading as a Tyrannosaurus rex.

name: Wing and a Prayer
summary_text: In WW2, an American aircraft carrier sails around the Pacific on a decoy mission until it joins the battle of Midway against the Japanese forces.

name: Wooden Crosses
summary_text: World War 1 begins and a young man enlists to fight for his country.

name: Hot Water
summary_text: Episodic look at married life and in-law problems. Adventures include a ride on a crowded trolley with a live turkey; a wild spin in a new auto with the in-laws in tow; and a sequence in ...                See full summary »

name: Aurora
summary_text: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other in order to finally stop running.

name: Slasher Party
summary_text: A group of social media influencers go to an afterparty in a Hollywood Hills mansion only to find themselves the target of a ruthless masked killer.

name: Miruthan
summary_text: A traffic police officer teams up with his friend and doctors in order to escape a deadly zombie apocalypse in the town and find out the possible antidote to stop it before time runs out.

name: Misunderstood
summary_text: Rome, 1984, Aria is nine-year-old girl. On the verge of divorce, Aria's infantile and selfish parents are too preoccupied with their careers and extra-marital affairs to properly tend to ...                See full summary »

name: Gölgesizler
summary_text: A barber working in Istanbul longs to be 'both here and far, far away'. And one day, without warning, he takes himself off and disappears abruptly into the great far away. The barber ...                See full summary »

name: Raatchasi
summary_text: Story of a rural Government school headmistress, who saves the school from its decline and reforms the same by handling the hindrances from private school owners, Govt. officials, politicians and even her colleagues.

name: Eat the Rich
summary_text: Alex (Al Pillay) is a disgruntled server at a snobby exclusive restaurant who falls on hard times. Forced to deal with the contempt and disgust of the upper class, Alex and cohorts attempt ...                See full summary »

name: ¡Vampiros en La Habana!
summary_text: A vampire family from Cuba is preparing for a showdown between the USA vampires and the Eastern European vampires. But with the aid of a scientist, they need a type of vaccination where they can live in daylight.

name: Long Live Death
summary_text: At the end of the Spanish civil war, Fando, a boy of about ten, tries to make sense of war and his father's arrest. His mother is religious, sympathetic to the Fascists; his father is ...                See full summary »

name: Zatoichi and the Chess Expert
summary_text: A samurai with a high skill in chess makes friends with Zatoichi, who finds that things become peculiar in his presence.

name: Arrowhead
summary_text: Chief of Scouts Ed Bannon works for the US Army at Fort Clark, Texas and he dreams of aiding in bringing peace to the region, despite opposition from both the Army and the Apaches.

name: Rope of Sand
summary_text: A man abused by a sadistic mining company cop before he could tell where on their desert property he'd found diamonds decides to steal them instead.

name: Judith of Bethulia
summary_text: A religious woman seeks to save her people from destruction by seducing and murdering the enemy leader, but her plans get complicated once she falls for him.

name: Tiempo después
summary_text: In a distant point of time, a man alters the world he knows when he tries to sell lemonade.

name: Darkest Day
summary_text: Dan wakes up on a beach with no memory. He discovers an empty city ravaged by a deadly virus. After befriending a small group of survivors it soon becomes clear the army is hunting him down...                See full summary »

name: Jayantabhai Ki Luv Story
summary_text: Jayantabhai is a street-thug and small time gangster, who unexpectedly falls in love with his enemy, who is Simrin. A romantic caper about how people unknowingly fall in love with people they least expect to.

name: Comedy Central Roast of Roseanne
summary_text: It's Roseanne Barr's turn to step in to the celebrity hot seat for the latest installment of The Comedy Central Roast.

name: 3some
summary_text: In an attempt to help his friend with his impotence, Jaime sets up two friends together. But after the failure, he comes in to help. What first appeared to be just a sexual experience evolves to a full romantic relationship of 3 people.

name: Tae-poong
summary_text: A modern-day pirate plans a massive attack on North and South Korea.

name: Primo amore
summary_text: Vittorio, a goldsmith looking for his perception of beauty, meets Sonia and manages to convince her to lose weight to an unhealthy degree.

name: Haan Maine Bhi Pyaar Kiya
summary_text: Shiv (Abhishek Bachchan) and Pooja (Karisma Kapoor) are happily married to each other but sometimes can get into the most petty arguments coming from the way they approach life. Shiv takes ...                See full summary »

name: Madison
summary_text: A story about a man's personal struggle to victory in the 1971 Madison, Indiana hydro-plane regatta.

name: I've Been Waiting for You
summary_text: A girl moves to a small town with her mom, only to be compared to a legendary witch with the same name.

name: Familia
summary_text: Santiago wakes up like any other morning. He goes down to the kitchen and his whole family is waiting for him: it's his birthday. They all sing "Happy Birthday to You" and give him presents...                See full summary »

name: Vale Abraão
summary_text: Ema is a very attractive but innocent girl, so pretty that cars crash in her presence. Young marries Dr. Carlo Paiva, who she is not attracted to, but is her father's friend. They move to ...                See full summary »

name: Mama is boos!
summary_text: When a wife and mother of two finds out her husband has an affair, she tries to make his life a living hell.

name: Tenderness of the Wolves
summary_text: Using his status as a police informant to procure his victims, baby-faced, shaven-headed Fritz Haarmann dismembers their bodies after death and sells the flesh to restaurants, dumping the remainder out of sight.

name: Caltiki, the Immortal Monster
summary_text: A team of archaeologists in Mexico encounter an amorphous, blob-like monster that appears to be connected with the collapse of the Mayan civilization.

name: Three Violent People
summary_text: When Confederate officer Colt Saunders returns to his Texas ranch after the war he finds his lands wanted by carpetbaggers and by corrupt provisional government commissioners Harrison and Cable.

name: The Last of the Mohicans
summary_text: During the brutal French and Indian War, the legendary scout Hawkeye is prevailed upon to escort Major Duncan Heyward, and the two daughters of Fort William Henry commander Colonel Munro -- Alice and Cora -- to safety through.

name: The Last Flight
summary_text: World War 1 veterans roam Paris drinking and admiring a woman they recently met.

name: Judah Friedlander: America is the Greatest Country in the United States
summary_text: Deadpan comic and self-proclaimed world champion Judah Friedlander performs over several nights in New York, explaining why America is No. 1.

name: Open Marriage
summary_text: To save their struggling marriage, Becca and Ron reluctantly agree to an open relationship with their friends Mindy and Max. Though their passion is rekindled, they don't expect the jealousy, heartbreak and betrayal that soon follow.

name: Problemos
summary_text: When a pandemic strikes the world, Victor and his family get stuck within a hippie community.

name: The Year of Spectacular Men
summary_text: Story of Izzy Klein, a young woman fresh out of college as she strikes up and ruins relationships with several men, and struggles to navigate the failures of post-college adulthood, leaning on her mother and older sister for support.

name: Burn Your Maps
summary_text: A family in emotional turmoil is taken by surprise in this quirky adventure where an eccentric 8-year-old American boy, Wes, has an existential epiphany - He believes that he is in fact a ...                See full summary »

name: Obsessed
summary_text: Secret and passionate affair between Colonel Jin Pyeong, trapped in a loveless marriage with Soo Jin, and Jong Ga Heun, the Chinese-Korean wife of Captain Kyung Woo Jin happens in the summer of 1969.

name: Stalnaya babochka
summary_text: Chuma (plague in Russian) is a homeless teenager who escapes from an orphanage and engages in robberies with other young mobsters in Moscow.

name: Prezít svuj zivot (teorie a praxe)
summary_text: The film uses a mix of cut-out animation from photographs and live-action segments, and tells the story of a married man who lives a double life in his dreams, where he is married to another woman.

name: Yo soy la Juani
summary_text: A pair of women leave their small town and dud boyfriends behind for fun in Madrid.

name: The History of Love
summary_text: The story of a long-lost book that mysteriously reappears and connects an old man searching for his son with a girl seeking a cure for her mother's loneliness.

name: Trip Out
summary_text: An old grudge, a misunderstood sexual advance and a drug score hurl three suburban teens into a head on collision of lust, intoxication, and pent up aggression.

name: The Best of Borat
summary_text: A series of reports by the ever enthusiastic Borat Karabzhanov, the Kazakhstani journalist.

name: Fireworks
summary_text: Ottone is a shopkeeper in a pet-shop. During a trip to the Maldives, he tells a psychoanalyst his history with women. Mara had left him for a butcher; Barbara, his best friend, betrays her ...                See full summary »

name: Saudagar
summary_text: Two clan chiefs who have maintained a blood feud for decades have to contend with the romance between their respective grandchildren.

name: The Valley of Death
summary_text: An army gold shipment and its escort vanish in the Ozarks, prompting accusations of theft and desertion but frontiersman Old Shatterhand and Apache chief Winnetou help solve the mystery of the missing army gold.

name: The H-Man
summary_text: When a narcotics deal goes sour and a suspect disappears, leaving only his clothes, Tokyo police question his wife and stake out the nightclub where she works. His disappearance stumps the ...                See full summary »

name: Forever Amber
summary_text: In seventeenth-century England, Amber St. Clair aims to raise herself from country girl to nobility, and succeeds, but loses her true love in the process.

name: Here Come the Co-eds
summary_text: Two bumblers become caretakers at an all-girls college. During their misadventures, the duo raise money to free the school from its traditionally-minded landlord.

name: Blood and Sand
summary_text: A toreador's familial and social life is threatened when he has an affair.

name: Holly Slept Over
summary_text: This unconventional comedy follows the relationship struggles of a married couple trying to conceive, their friends who have lost their spark, and the tension that ensues when an old college roommate stays over for the weekend.

name: Marvel Studios: Assembling a Universe
summary_text: A look at the story behind Marvel Studios and the Marvel Cinematic Universe, featuring interviews and behind-the-scenes footage from all of the Marvel films, the Marvel One-Shots and "Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D."

name: Pandiya Naadu
summary_text: A man goes against a mafia gang to avenge his brother's death.

name: Common
summary_text: Jimmy McGovern's gritty drama stars Nico Mirallegro as guileless seventeen-year-old Johnjo O'Shea, who goes from innocent bystander to accessory to premeditated murder after giving a few friends a lift.

name: Kuime
summary_text: Fiction begins to bleed into reality for actors (Ebizo Ichikawa, Ko Shibasaki, Hideaki Ito) as they rehearse a stage production of a classic Japanese ghost story.

name: Fiston
summary_text: Alex is in love with Sandra since childhood but has never dared approach her.He asks Antoine, a lonely writer to help him seduce her, because in his time he was the only one to conquer the heart of the mother.

name: Holiday High School Reunion
summary_text: When a woman learns of her high school reunion a week before Christmas, she's ecstatic to finally have her chance to win back the one "that got away".
